reviews.author: Mary Jones
reviews.comment: I loved the movie! It was a great experience seeing it in the theater and I couldn't recommend it more.

reviews.author: Andrew Finch
reviews.comment: One of my favorite movies of all time. Sit back, grab some friends, and watch this cinematic masterpiece with a BIG bag of popcorn.

reviews.author: Tim Martin
reviews.comment: A solid movie. The plot has some holes but overall a good time.
